name: Room of the Hundred
description:
If the cursor does not appear, take it out of the game window and put it back in.

You can press F11 for strech the game to full screen.

(Seems to don't work properly sometimes, but enter and exit fullscreen mode should fix this)

Game made in 72h for the Mini Jam 8.

Theme and Limitations:

Theme is fantasy, so you will play a kind of wizard trying to survive horde of zombies.

The limitation is only one room, so you will have to do the above things in an unique room :D

Controls:

Left click to move: you can let the click pressed.

How to play:

Lead enemies on traps: the yellow radius show the trigger area.

Kill the more you can with a single trap: when a trap explode, all the enemies in the blue area are killed.

Avoid walking on traps: if you run on a trap, it explode and you take damage, but not the enemies!

Oh, and you get hurt if an enemy is too close to you.
